title: [Funding alert] Tech startup Logically raises $24M led by Vitruvian Partners - YourStory
content: [Funding alert] Tech startup Logically raises $24M led by Vitruvian Partners  YourStory
description: The UK, US, and India-based technology startup Logically will use the capital to accelerate its fight against harmful and misleading online information in critical areas, including election integrity, public health, and national security.
